data: {"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/3Mm2KDkOoQV8u0O5wKUkN1EOhgo.jpg","belongs_to_collection":null,"budget":0,"genres":[{"id":18,"name":"Drama"},{"id":53,"name":"Thriller"},{"id":9648,"name":"Mystery"}],"homepage":"https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0CYM7ZZDB","id":1213742,"imdb_id":"tt28248897","origin_country":["US"],"original_language":"en","original_title":"Tyler Perry's Divorce in the Black","overview":"Ava, a young bank professional is devastated when her husband Dallas abandons a marriage she is determined to fight for until fate intervenes, revealing Dallas' wicked deeds that have trashed their marriage, and once upon a time sabotaged Ava's destiny to be loved by her true soulmate.","popularity":292.598,"poster_path":"/d5X03SA51Ezd02iF9BCjWXC9X9F.jpg","production_companies":[{"id":3096,"logo_path":"/fkZTZ4veYYr3lwr2riVrVAOfeqD.png","name":"Tyler Perry Studios","origin_country":"US"},{"id":210099,"logo_path":"/d6HwljzlOzxJ4tXlrpRkNZaZMWL.png","name":"Amazon MGM Studios","origin_country":"US"}],"production_countries":[{"iso_3166_1":"US","name":"United States of America"}],"release_date":"2024-07-11","revenue":0,"runtime":121,"spoken_languages":[{"english_name":"English","iso_639_1":"en","name":"English"}],"status":"Released","tagline":"Fear has no place in love.","title":"Tyler Perry's Divorce in the Black","video":false,"vote_average":6.714,"vote_count":21}
